tooltip.title: Is Less Than or Equal?
tooltip.body: Compares two values. Returns True if the left value is less than or equal to the right value.

tips.example:
a = 2
b = 3
 c = 2
 if a <= b:
	print("a is less than b")

if c <= a:
	print("c is equal to a")

a = 1
b = 5
while a <= b:
	a += 1
print(a)
print(a)
